title: Header Toolbox
description: Parse raw HTTP headers into structured JSON and ready-to-use cURL snippets.

input.label: Raw headers
input.helper: Paste headers from DevTools, a proxy, or cURL. One header per line.

empty.curl: Generate headers to see a cURL snippet.

sample:
Content-Type: application/json
Accept: application/json
X-Request-Id: 7b92f4
Set-Cookie: theme=dark
Set-Cookie: session=abc123

openGraph.title: Header Toolbox
openGraph.description: Convert raw HTTP headers into JSON and shareable cURL commands.
